subject: Basketball
Music
lead_paragraph: “Brooklyn: Something to Lean On,” a team song created by the Grammy-nominated artist John Forté, has been galvanizing fans as a symbol of the Nets’ rebirth in New York.
snippet: “Brooklyn: Something to Lean On,” a team song created by the Grammy-nominated artist John Forté, has been galvanizing fans as a symbol of the Nets’ rebirth in New York.
